justification: Singapore is a global leader in AI implementation, ranking 2nd in the Oxford Insights Government AI Readiness Index 2024 (Score: 84.25, vs US 87.03) and 3rd in the UN E-Government Development Index 2024 (Score: 0.9691). The National AI Strategy 2.0 (NAIS 2.0), launched in Dec 2023, is backed by over S$1 billion in funding and aims for 15,000 AI experts. Enterprise adoption is surging: SME AI adoption tripled to 14.5% in 2024, while 62.5% of non-SME firms have adopted AI. The digital economy now accounts for 18.6% of GDP. (Sources: Oxford Insights 2024, IMDA Singapore Digital Economy Report 2025, United Nations 2024).
